title: Monitor Stadium Surveillance for Overcrowding
description: The venue's security operator needs to monitor surveillance cameras to identify any potential overcrowding in the stadium's concourses.

tasks.description: Access the live feeds from all surveillance cameras in the stadium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is viewing the live camera feeds on a dashboard.

tasks.description: Use an AI-powered video analytics tool to automatically detect crowd density.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool flags a specific concourse area as having high crowd density.

tasks.description: Dispatch security and event staff to the flagged area to help manage the crowd flow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends staff to the location to prevent a safety issue.
